title: F*ck Off Unless You’re The One - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Jealousy   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Short Story
author: Carbonic Acid   Tan Suan   碳酸
description:
Fang Yuhang was now single.

Because a white lotus appeared between Nan Cheng and him.

Under the encouragement of his friends, he joined a television programme, “Are You The One”.

He wanted to cause frustration to that scum top and that white lotus.

When the television program started.

Fang Yuhang saw his scum top dressed in a suit, standing upright next to him.

F*ck! Fang Yuhang ground his teeth and sent a text to his friends.

“Are you f*cking helping me or digging me a pit?!”>
